page.title: 17RELIGION IN KINGS NORTON
page.content: In Kings Norton there are four churches .There also used to be a church on mass House lane but this was knocked down approximately 7 years ago.{St Nicolas} is the oldest church in Kings Norton. It is Church of England and it was built in Norman times so that it could serve the village of Kings Norton. They built{ St.Pauls} church because of the new housing estates and{catholics} who lived in them. Origanally this parish used to belonged to St.JosephÂ£s. {St.JosephÂ£s} was getting large and through the poor bus routes the people who lived on the estate found it too far to go.Before the church was built we used to have mass in St.PaulÂ£s schoool hall. By children of St.Pauls Catholic J/I School.
